skins.shipDescription: Gato-class submarine ¨C Albacore, Hull Number SS-218.
skins.selfIntroduction: My achievements? Let's see... Oh, right! I sank Taihou! She shouldn't have sunk so easily, though... Actually, why DID she sink?
skins.acquisition: Tadaaah! I'm Albacore, from the Eagle Union! Oh, did I jump out and scare you? Sorry 'bout that~! I'll be a member of the fleet from now on, so let's get along!
skins.login: The Commander's back? Sweet, today's gonna be jam-packed with mischie... Err, I mean, time for work!
skins.details: Hohoh, I must've caught your attention~ Let me guess... you like 'em young, don't you, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: So, who are you into, Commander? Come on, tell me~ It'll be a secret between us... At least for a while!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm SOOOOOO tireeeeed~! Lemme sit on your lap, Commander! ... Sweet! Thanks, friendo!
skins.secretaryIdle3: This? This is how I've always looked. Do ya like it? Let me guess... you're having naughty thoughts, aren'tcha~?
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh, my! Not even submarines are safe from the Commander's evil clutches!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I wonder what'd happen to you if I were to scream for help right now... Wanna find out? Heheheh~

skins.shipDescription: Oopsie! I totally just dropped something by mistake~! I'd better pick it up quick! Hmm? Saw something you shouldn't have, Commander? Hehehe~ That makes you my partner in crime now!
skins.acquisition: Oopsie! I totally just dropped something by mistake~! I'd better pick it up quick! Hmm? Saw something you shouldn't have, Commander? Hehehe~ That makes you my partner in crime now!
skins.login: How about a... KAPOW! Gave you a real scare, didn't I? Teehee~ Turned out pretty good, if I say so myself~
skins.details: You wanna warn people about my firecrackers? Hehehe~ By all means, go ahead~ But how exactly are you gonna explain knowing that I had 'em hidden under my dress~? You get where I'm going with this, don'tcha? Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you seen Taihou anywhere? I've got an explosive surprise for her!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Which do you like more: this dress, or my ordinary getup? Why do I even ask? Hehehe~ C'mon, don't be shy and answer the question~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Over here, Commander! You agreed to be my accomplice right when you caught wind of my plan, so you've gotta follow me around the whole day~
skins.secretaryTouch: You're gonna dig up location info under the guise of dancing with someone? Hey, pretty good idea! Huh? You just wanna dance? With me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I wonder how people would look at you if I set off a firecracker right now... Wanna find out? Heheheh~
